content: Selling brand new Nintendo Switch™ with Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy‑Con™  Look at pics...thats exactly what you will get.             Price $250 in BTC  PLUS shipping....depending where and how you want to ship. Not responsible for customs and any other fees.     Escrow at buyers expense and only with MinerJones.     So please reach out of serious. Look at pics.
